009
010package imagingbook.common.edges;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
014
015import ij.plugin.filter.Convolver;
016import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
017import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
018import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
019import imagingbook.common.image.PixelPack;
020import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
021import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
022
023/**
024 * <p>
025 * Multi-Gradient ("DiZenzo/Cumani-style") color edge detector.
026 * Applicable to color images ({@link ColorProcessor}) only.
027 * See Sec. 16.2 (Alg. 16.2) of [1] for additional details.
028 * </p>
029 * <p>
030 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>,
031 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
032 * </p>
033 * 
034 * @author WB
035 * @version 2013/05/30
036 * @version 2022/09/07 implement interface, use PixelPack, renamed to MultiGradientEdgeDetector
037 * @version 2022/09/11 convolutions implemented with IjUtils
038 */
039public class MultiGradientEdgeDetector implements EdgeDetector {
040        
041        /**
042         * Parameters for {@link MultiGradientEdgeDetector} (currently unused, no parameters to set).
043         */
044        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle<MultiGradientEdgeDetector> {
045        }
046        
047        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
048        private final Parameters params;
049        private final int M;    // image width
050        private final int N;    // image height
051        private final FloatProcessor E_mag;     // edge magnitude map
052        private final FloatProcessor E_ort;     // edge orientation map
053
054        // Sobel-kernels for x/y-derivatives:
055    private static final float[][] HxS = Matrix.multiply(1.0f/8, new float[][] {
056                        {-1, 0, 1},
057                    {-2, 0, 2},
058                    {-1, 0, 1}});
059
060    private static final float[][] HyS = Matrix.multiply(1.0f/8, new float[][] {
061                        {-1, -2, -1},
062                        { 0,  0,  0},
063                        { 1,  2,  1}});
064    
065        public MultiGradientEdgeDetector(ColorProcessor cp) {
066                this(cp, new Parameters());
067        }
068        
069        public MultiGradientEdgeDetector(ColorProcessor cp, Parameters params) {
070                this.params = params;
071                this.M = cp.getWidth();
072                this.N = cp.getHeight();
073                this.E_mag = new FloatProcessor(M, N);
074                this.E_ort = new FloatProcessor(M, N);
075                findEdges(cp);
076        }
077
078        private void findEdges(ColorProcessor cp) {
079                FloatProcessor[] I = new PixelPack(cp).getFloatProcessors();
080                
081                // calculate image derivatives in x/y for all color channels:
082            FloatProcessor[] Ix = new FloatProcessor[3];
083            FloatProcessor[] Iy = new FloatProcessor[3];
084            Convolver conv = new Convolver();
085                conv.setNormalize(false);
086                for (int k = 0; k < 3; k++) {
087                        Ix[k] = I[k];
088                        Iy[k] = (FloatProcessor) Ix[k].duplicate();
089                        IjUtils.convolve(Ix[k], HxS);
090                        IjUtils.convolve(Iy[k], HyS);
091                }
092                
093                // calculate color edge magnitude and orientation:
094                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
095                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
096                                double rx = Ix[0].getf(u, v), ry = Iy[0].getf(u, v);
097                                double gx = Ix[1].getf(u, v), gy = Iy[1].getf(u, v);
098                                double bx = Ix[2].getf(u, v), by = Iy[2].getf(u, v);
099                                
100                                double A = rx*rx + gx*gx + bx*bx;
101                                double B = ry*ry + gy*gy + by*by;
102                                double C = rx*ry + gx*gy + bx*by;
103                                
104                                double lambda0 = 0.5 * (A + B + sqrt(sqr(A - B) + 4 * sqr(C)));
105                                double theta0 =  0.5 * Math.atan2(2 * C, A - B);
106
107                                E_mag.setf(u, v, (float) sqrt(lambda0));
108                                E_ort.setf(u, v, (float) theta0);
109                        }
110                }
111        }
112        
113        @Override
114        public FloatProcessor getEdgeMagnitude() {
115                return E_mag;
116        }
117
118        @Override
119        public FloatProcessor getEdgeOrientation() {
120                return E_ort;
121        }
122        
123}
